short_summary: Purchase of HPE Memories or equivalent.
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of HPE Memories or equivalent for Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Summary

This solicitation is for the purchase of HPE Memories or equivalent for Fisheries and Oceans Canada by Shared Services Canada.

### Solicitation Details

| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Reference Number**: | SSC-24-00025844:T |
| **Amendment Number**: | 2 |
| **Solicitation Number**: | BPM021004/25844 |
| **Original Publication Date**: | 2024-02-29 |
| **Closing Date**: | 2024-03-14T14:00:00 |
| **Amendment Date**: | 2024-03-11 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date**: | None |
| **Expected Contract End Date**: | None |
| **Tender Status**: | Expiring |

### Solicitation Overview

The Government of Canada is seeking responses for the purchase of HPE Memories or equivalent for Fisheries and Oceans Canada. Solicitation Amendment #2 is being raised to remove the OEM Certification requirement and provide Canada's responses to suppliers' questions.

### Registration Information

To register and participate in the solicitation, log in to the SSC P2P platform at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login). Registered bidders can view solicitations, submit responses, receive updates, and be awarded contracts.

### Attachment Information

For more information about the solicitation, please visit [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/A5DF8ABD-E376-49E3-A746-04F3E9FFEDB0). There are a total of [4](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/A5DF8ABD-E376-49E3-A746-04F3E9FFEDB0) attachments available for download.

### Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name (Francophone)**: Services partagés Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 90, rue Metcalfe, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
